definition: Gulangyu, scenic island off Xiamen 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2]
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
wave/breaker/unrestrained/dissipated/to stroll/to ramble
islet

sentences.english: Sunlight Rock and western-style houses hidden in the lush greenery on Gulangyu Islet, a tiny island off the coast of Xiamen, were faintly visible.
sentences.chinese: 陽光下的鼓浪嶼，日光巖和綠林掩映的洋房依稀可見。

sentences.english: Thank you for spending the whole day with me on Gulang Island.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你花了一天時間陪我遊玩鼓浪嶼。

sentences.english: On the third day, We visited to Gulangyu.
sentences.chinese: 第三天，我們參觀了鼓浪嶼。

sentences.english: L : What about Gulangyu Island and Nanputuo Temple?
sentences.chinese: 我們去鼓浪嶼和南普陀怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Another photo from Gulangyu, taken near the famous piano museum.
sentences.chinese: 也在鼓浪嶼，在著名的鋼琴博物館的附近。

sentences.english: The rocks near the Gulangyu Island contribute to the topographic development in the bay.
sentences.chinese: 鼓浪嶼島附近的礁羣對海灣內地形發育產生影響。

sentences.english: The beauty of Gulangyu is hidden more in the rows of old houses on the island.
sentences.chinese: 鼓浪嶼的美麗，更多地隱藏在島上一棟棟老房子裏。

sentences.english: In the last day of Gulangyu, it was relaxed a lot relatively.
sentences.chinese: 雜談在鼓浪嶼的最後一天，相對悠閒很多。

sentences.english: The first chapter tells the process of formation of Gulangyu as a leased territory.
sentences.chinese: 第一章敘述了鼓浪嶼租界地形成的過程。

sentences.english: This first one is taken on a sunny day on Gulangyu.
sentences.chinese: 我拍的一張在鼓浪嶼的晴朗的一天。

sentences.english: The Sunlight Cliff, the best beauty spot of Xiamen region, is located in the heart of Gulangyu Island.
sentences.chinese: 日光巖位於鼓浪嶼中部，是廈門的龍頭景區。

sentences.english: The hope can protect the old villa on island bosomy billow through this kind of means.
sentences.chinese: 希望能夠通過這種方式來保護鼓浪嶼上的老別墅。

sentences.english: Gulangyu Island has lots of great little hole in the wall restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 鼓浪嶼有好多很好的街邊小店。

sentences.english: The beautiful harbour scenery including Gulangyu Island also attracts a lot of tourists.
sentences.chinese: 包括鼓浪嶼在內的海灣風景吸引了大量遊客。

definition: Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
Lijiang prefecture-level city in northwest Yunnan
tavern/guest house/inn/hotel
coast/seaside/seashore/beach
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
Lhasa, capital city of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
roundabout (traffic island)/around an island (trip etc)
Sanya prefecture level city, Hainan
Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
over there/yonder
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
beach/sandy shore/CL:片[pian4]
backpacker/travel buddy
